about_the_game:
In a world where everything has sunk into the sea, protect the ark with big-breasted swimsuit beauties!

A high-tempo defense game with simple controls! The ark "Mobile Oceanic City GFM Oceanus" is inhabited only by big-breasted beauties in swimsuits. The visitor, Neptes, must fight against the [Creatures of the Abyss] who threaten them and uncover the mystery of the [Great Abyssal Goddess].

Prepare for stronger enemies with each wave by selecting cards and upgrading your characters.

Selected cards include passive skills, active skills, parameter level-ups, and heroine upgrades. There are over 60 types of cards!

Each stage features unique mechanics, chance events that can turn the tide of battle, recovery events, and shops. You can also sometimes specify the three attributes of enemies, adapting to your build for an advantage.

The ExArts, which heroines can use at regular intervals, are spectacular! They can change the course of battle!

Even in defeat, you can perform various permanent upgrades at the base! Increasing damage reduction in particular will make the game easier to progress!

【Story】

The Void Sea. No land exists. Only a disc of water floats in space.

In the Void Sea, the only existence is the ark [GFM Oceanus], where only the daughters of kings, permitted by the Great Goddess, reside.

Neptes, a visitor from the outside world, is the only male. He was raised in the outside world by the elderly king Kianos, and according to Kianos's will, he must protect Oceanus, solve the mystery of the [Great Abyssal Goddess], and escape the Void Sea with them.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content,  General Mature Content.All characters are over the age of 20.

In a world where everything has sunk into the sea, protect the ark with big-breasted swimsuit beauties!

A high-tempo defense game with simple controls! The ark "Mobile Oceanic City GFM Oceanus" is inhabited only by big-breasted beauties in swimsuits. The visitor, Neptes, must fight against the [Creatures of the Abyss] who threaten them and uncover the mystery of the [Great Abyssal Goddess].

Even in defeat, you can perform various permanent upgrades at the base! Increasing damage reduction in particular will make the game easier to progress!

name: OCEANIDES of the World's End: Legend of the Big-Breasted Swimsuit Beauty Guardian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7 after
  • Processor: core2 1.7GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX430
  • Additional Notes: DirectX version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows7 after
  • Processor: core2 1.7GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX430
  • Additional Notes: DirectX version 11

short_description: "Fast-paced, rogue-like defense action game with simple controls! The Ark of Beauties in Swimsuits, 'GFM Oceanus,' is inhabited solely by stunning women. Neptes must battle the Deep Ones threatening them and unravel the mystery of the 'Great Mother of the Abyss.'"
supported_languages: Japanese, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
